channel.title: Nimka Private Server-------(VPS)(SOF)(24/7)-------
channel.description:
BETA v1 Nimka Private Server-------(VPS)(SOF)(24/7)------- WEB CLIENT http://nmka.site88.net/play/webclient.php Forums http://www.nmka.eu
Added In Working MoneyPouch! Fixed the dupe in the MoneyPouch Fixed the Drop Dupe Added In Summoning Orb With Draining Fixed Cheat Egine Dupe! Added in custom items Added in [Server] Announcement when you get 99 [100% Working] Added in LevelPoints with a Store Added in custom GFX and Anime for some basic commands Added in Lottery, [Lottie] Disabled Shops for Users That Can Spawn Staff or players who can spawn can not attend in the lottery Added 2 Starters Per Ip Added Custom Log-ins when Staff Log in Fixed Total Level Donators need Donor points to use their Shops not cash[Makes it so reg players cant be teled there and buy the items] Vote4Cash Voting System with SOF Spins on claim 100% Timed mute 100% Timed Ban Fixed Smithing (x5, x10) Added 120 Dungeoneering Fixed The Arrow Dupe Glitch Added Server AutoSave Fixed Lag when banking all Added Player Titles Added Auto-Server Save Added UIDs Added in SOF InterFace Added in KillStreak Point System Made KS give you extra PK Points Re-Wrote Mage (Was totally fucked up on v1) Custom Npc Shops Added in dice command for Donator+ AND SO MUCH MORE!

BETA v1 Nimka Private Server-------(VPS)(SOF)(24/7)-------
WEB CLIENT http://nmka.site88.net/play/webclient.php
Forums http://www.nmka.eu

Added In Working MoneyPouch!
Fixed the dupe in the MoneyPouch
Fixed the Drop Dupe
Added In Summoning Orb With Draining
Fixed Cheat Egine Dupe!
Added in custom items
Added in [Server] Announcement when you get 99 [100% Working]
Added in LevelPoints with a Store
Added in custom GFX and Anime for some basic commands
Added in Lottery, [Lottie]
Disabled Shops for Users That Can Spawn
Staff or players who can spawn can not attend in the lottery
Added 2 Starters Per Ip
Added Custom Log-ins when Staff Log in
Fixed Total Level
Donators need Donor points to use their Shops not cash[Makes it so reg players cant be teled there and buy the items]
Vote4Cash Voting System with SOF Spins on claim
100% Timed mute
100% Timed Ban
Fixed Smithing (x5, x10)
Added 120 Dungeoneering
Fixed The Arrow Dupe Glitch
Added Server AutoSave
Fixed Lag when banking all
Added Player Titles
Added Auto-Server Save
Added UIDs
Added in SOF InterFace
Added in KillStreak Point System
Made KS give you extra PK Points
Re-Wrote Mage (Was totally fucked up on v1)
Custom Npc Shops
Added in dice command for Donator+
AND SO MUCH MORE!
